title: Atlantic City USA
creator_credit: Louis Malle, Denis Heroux, Selta Films and Cine-Neighbour
brief_description: The legalisation of gambling in Atlantic City brings about big changes in the life of an aging, smalltime numbers runner, especially when he meets up with a beautiful younger woman who entangles him with the Mob. Starring Burt Lancaster and Susan Sarandon.
creator_credit_for_label: Louis Malle, Denis Heroux, Selta Films and Cine-Neighbour
